headline: Show HN: A Chrome extension to download all your [Liked] videos from TikTok
description:
- Goal: the TikTok algorithm has helped me find wonderful things, and I consider the full list of my [Likes] to be a precious collection of concentrated wonderfulness, and want to maintain a local copy for safekeeping.

- How it works: you visit tiktok.com and sign in, the extension retrieves MP4s and puts them in a folder.

- There's a good video quickly walking through all the features if you prefer a video: https://youtu.be/BoHOdRxHgP0

- Is it free: Yes. (I did test with putting a cap at 1000 or 5000 downloads to see if users are willing to pay to unlock more, but people gave me 1-star ratings for it, so I gave up)

- Changelog: https://github.com/ZYinMD/myfaveTT/releases

- Privacy and Legal: https://myfavett.com/privacy.html
